technology.description: 'Tune' works with Facebook, Twitter and Reddit.
technology.content: Jigsaw admits that Tune is still an experiment, meaning it may not spot all forms of toxicity or could hide non-offensive comments. "We're constantly working to improve the underlying technology, and users can easily give feedback right in the tool to help us… [+1142 chars]

technology.author: Liam Martin
technology.title: Fortnite 8.10 PATCH NOTES: Baller update, Vending Machine free items, Getaway LTM - Express
technology.description: FORTNITE fans should check out update 8.1 patch notes while the game is offline for maintenance.
technology.content: Fortnite update 8.1 is live, complete with a lengthy list of patch notes. According to the official Epic Games patch notes, the big new addition is The Baller vehicle. The Baller was unveiled within the in-game newsfeed, complete with a hint about what to exp… [+8855 chars]
